data.title: Go Purple for MDC on 9th June!
meta_keywords: Wear purple and donate for Manchester deaf Centre
data.meta_description: Wear purple and donate for Manchester deaf Centre, enter your photo to win a voucher!
data.text:
Did you know there are approximately 11 million people in the UK who are deaf or hard of hearing? There are approximately 150,000 British Sign Language users. BSL is a rich and beautiful language comprising of hand gestures, facial expressions and body movement. It was recognised as a language in its own right in 2003.

What to do

Letâs work together to spread deaf awareness. Wear one item of purple, or go all out and dress head to toe in MDC colours! A generous donation of Â£1 made by anyone involved in MDC will collectively make a huge difference to the vital services we provide.

Donate via our website here

Competition time

Want to win a Â£10 Amazon gift voucher? Submit your photos of yourself wearing purple by tagging us across social media and using the hashtags #gopurpleformdc #mdcday â weâll pick our 5 favourites and announce the winners on 11/06/21 â gift vouchers will then be posted out. See the top bar of the website for our social media feeds.
